Text: Almoharín is a municipality located in the province of Cáceres, Extremadura, Spain.

Triplets:<Almoharín
3:
--------------------
<Text: Almoharín:  Almoharin is known as the 'Fig Capital of the World' on account of these figs; black and smooth-textured.>
Triplets:<Almoharín
4:
--------------------
<Text: Almoharín:  Both dried figs and chocolate figs are exported worldwide.>
Triplets:<Almoharín
6:
--------------------
Text: Almoharín:  There is an accompanying exhibition of the history of sheep and cheese-making in the area.
